title: Bluetooth connectivity
content:
I'm trying to connect to my smart tv (a Samsung one) and I just can't. I pair wit the TV and 10 seconds after it disconnects and I can't connect again. Does anyone knows what can be the problem? This Bluetooth connectivity/compatibility issues are really annoying...
Another thing is that I tried to connect to the TV with my old nexus 5 and it worked perfectly...

Thanks in advance!
